sourcesContent:
<template>
    <b-container fluid="true" class="rodape">

        <b-row class="legenda">
            <legenda-item v-for="andamento in andamentos"
                          :key="andamento.numero"
                          :andamento="andamento"/>
        </b-row>

        <b-row v-if="!esconderCopyright" id="copyright">
            <copyright/>
        </b-row>

    </b-container>
</template>

<script>
    import LegendaItem from './LegendaItem'
    import Copyright from "./Copyright";
    import {mapGetters} from 'vuex'

    export default {
        name: 'Legenda',
        props: ['esconderCopyright'],
        components: {
            Copyright,
            LegendaItem
        },
        computed: {
            ...mapGetters({
                andamentos: 'getAndamentos'
            })
        }
    }
</script>

<style scoped>
    .rodape {
        width: 100%;
        background-color: #343a40;
        color: white;
        position: fixed;
        bottom: 0;
        padding-top: 0.8vmin;
        padding-bottom: 0.5vmin;
        z-index: 2;
    }

    .legenda {
        padding-bottom: 0.5vmin;
        padding-left: 1.5vmax
    }

    @media only screen and (max-height: 800px) {
        #copyright {
            display: none;
        }
    }

</style>
